channel.title: news on The DAISy Lab @ NC State
channel.description: Recent content in news on The DAISy Lab @ NC State

item.title: Currently Recruiting Graduate Students in Biological and Agricultural Engineering at NC State
item.description: The DAISy Lab is currently seeking highly motivated graduate students to conduct research developing innovative robotics and sensing technologies to solve agricultural and environmental engineering problems. Students will be part of collaborative, multi-disciplinary projects that seek to improve the sensing and sense-making process for a variety of applications, including plant phenotying, precision agriculture, and . The positions are particularly well-suited for students interested in a mixture of hardware development, data analytics, and field work.
